title: Woman who was GHOSTED by a date shares horror after stumbling across his secret fiancée on Facebook
text:
A young woman who was ghosted by a man she dated has shared her horror after stumbling across his secret fiancée on Facebook.

The Australian woman said she exchanged numbers with Charlie after the pair met at a pub following her relationship breakdown.

The pair struck up a conversation via text before they agreed to meet for drinks.

As she felt 'nervous' about their first date, Charlie quickly put her mind at ease by telling her he was feeling the same way too because he was 'newly single'.

A young woman who was ghosted by a man she dated has shared her horror after stumbling across his secret fiancée on Facebook (stock image)

Speaking to Mamamia, the woman said they were texting every day - from sharing jokes to the mundane things in between planning their dates.

The couple went on two more dates, before Charlie offered to book gold class seats at the movies ahead of a Saturday night screening.

On the morning of their next date, she received a text from Charlie, asking if they could postpone the movies for Tuesday because he was 'hungover'.

She said she was fine about rescheduling but as the days went by, she noticed something wasn't right after she didn't hear from him.

'On Tuesday, I fired off a text: "Still on for tonight?" Nothing. I was utterly baffled.'

She decided to send one final text, joking about his hangover - but she never got a response from him.

'I felt humiliated,' she said.

Just a couple of weeks later, Charlie's profile randomly popped up and she noticed his surname was completely different to what he had provided.

But her heart sank when she came across a picture of him snugging up to a girl.

'More scrolling revealed the girl in the first photo was his girlfriend - no, wait. His fiancée. Three months earlier - not that long before Charlie and I met in that dingy pub - he'd asked this girl to marry him, and she said yes,' she said.

After contemplating whether or not to confront Charlie or tell his fiancée about the affair, the woman said she decided it was best to block his profile.

'For my own sanity, not because I expected to ever hear from him again,' she said.
description: An Australian woman who was ghosted by a man she dated has shared her horror after stumbling across his secret fiancée on Facebook.
authors: Cindy Tran For Daily Mail Australia
